plot outline: Vishwasrao is married to Prajakta for years but circumstances force him to marry Madhvi on her wedding day as her groom wants to call off the wedding, Prajakta and Madhvi decide to share their husband equally but Pari enters their life claiming to be his third wife.
title: Teen Bayka Fajiti Aika
plot: Vishwasrao is married to Prajakta for years but circumstances force him to marry Madhvi on her wedding day as her groom wants to call off the wedding, Prajakta and Madhvi decide to share their husband equally but Pari enters their life claiming to be his third wife.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com

Married for five years and yet childless, middle-aged Vishwasrao is under pressure to perform, literally. Set in a remote Wada in Maharashtra, the film sees a very loving Vishwasrao being a good husband to Wife no.1, Prajakta (Nisha Parulekar). With a mother (Surekha Kudchi) who'd kill for honour, with a comical turn of events, Vishwasrao finds himself married to Wife no.2 Madhavi (Kranti Redkar). While Vishwasrao's hopes for a ''honeymoon'' takes flight, his two wives strike and a uncanny friendship that have him at his wits' end. Watch the film to know how all hell breaks loose with the entry of Wife no.3 Pari (Tejashree).
